page.title: 07ADULT RECREATION.
page.content: In my dad's spare time he cuts the lawn and waters the garden if it hasn't rained.He cleans the garden if it is untidy with crisp packets and many other things. In my mam's spare time she reads books written by Agatha Cristie. She also weeds the garden and goes to see my nana.When she goes to bed she takes a book to read. {Michael's spare-time activities. On Sunday I go with my friends to the fisheries. When we get there we should see a big place where you go fishing.Before we come to the fishing pond we see a place where they sell fish. When we get there we go on a raft made of wood into the water.We go for a walk in the woods. After we have been in woods we go to Ysceifiog to play in the park and talk to the people there then we go home.
